generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic value class Nullable
.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Nullable`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.ValueType

typeparam.span: 泛型类型的基础值类型。

span.span: The underlying value type of the generic type.

summary.span: 表示可分配有 的值类型。

span.span: Represents a value type that can be assigned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可以为类型赋值或赋值，则可以为 null `null` ，这意味着类型没有任何值。A type is said to be nullable if it can be assigned a value or can be assigned `null`, which means the type has no value whatsoever. 默认情况下，所有引用类型（如 ）都可以为 null，但所有值类型（如 ）都不是。By default, all reference types, such as , are nullable, but all value types, such as , are not. 在 c # 和 Visual Basic 中，通过在 `?` 值类型后使用表示法将值类型标记为可为 null。In C# and Visual Basic, you mark a value type as nullable by using the `?` notation after the value type. 例如， `int?` 在 c # 或 `Integer?` in Visual Basic 声明可分配的整数值类型 `null` 。For example, `int?` in C# or `Integer?` in Visual Basic declares an integer value type that can be assigned `null`. 此 结构支持仅将值类型用作可以为 null 的类型，因为引用类型在设计上是可以为 null 的。The structure supports using only a value type as a nullable type because reference types are nullable by design. 类提供对结构的互补支持 。The class provides complementary support for the structure. 类支持获取可以为 null 的类型的基础类型，以及针对其基础值类型不支持泛型比较和相等运算的可以为 null 的类型对的比较和相等运算。The class supports obtaining the underlying type of a nullable type, and comparison and equality operations on pairs of nullable types whose underlying value type does not support generic comparison and equality operations. ## 基本属性Fundamental Properties 结构的两个基本成员 是 和 属性。The two fundamental members of the structure are the and properties. 如果 对象的属性 为，则 `true` 可以使用属性访问对象的值 。If the property for a object is `true`, the value of the object can be accessed with the property. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则对象的值是未定义的，尝试访问属性将 引发 。If the property is `false`, the value of the object is undefined and an attempt to access the property throws an . ## 装箱和取消装箱Boxing and Unboxing 如果将可为 null 的类型装箱，公共语言运行时将自动装箱对象的基础值 ，而不是 对象本身。When a nullable type is boxed, the common language runtime automatically boxes the underlying value of the object, not the object itself. 也就是说，如果 属性为，则 `true` 属性的内容 为装箱。That is, if the property is `true`, the contents of the property is boxed. 如果可以为 null 的类型的基础值为取消装箱，则公共语言运行时将创建一个新的结构，该 结构已初始化为基础值。When the underlying value of a nullable type is unboxed, the common language runtime creates a new structure initialized to the underlying value. 如果 `HasValue` 可为 null 的类型的属性为 `false` ，则装箱操作的结果为 `null` 。If the `HasValue` property of a nullable type is `false`, the result of a boxing operation is `null`. 因此，如果将一个装箱的可以为 null 的类型传递给需要对象参数的方法，则该方法必须准备好处理参数为的情况 `null` 。Consequently, if a boxed nullable type is passed to a method that expects an object argument, that method must be prepared to handle the case where the argument is `null`. 如果取消 `null` 装箱到可为 null 的类型，公共语言运行时将创建一个新的 结构，并 `HasValue` 将其属性初始化为 `false` 。When `null` is unboxed into a nullable type, the common language runtime creates a new structure and initializes its `HasValue` property to `false`. ## [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] 和 Windows 运行时组件and Windows Runtime Components 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] ，可以将 类型包含为在 WinMD 库中导出的结构的成员。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)], you can include a type as a member of a structure exported in a WinMD library. 以前，此操作不受支持。Previously, this was not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了 Microsoft Pubs 示例数据库中表的三行。The following code example defines three rows of a table in the Microsoft Pubs sample database. 该表包含两个不可为 null 的列和两个可以为 null 的列。The table contains two columns that are not nullable and two columns that are nullable. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cpp/tarow.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cs/tarow.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/vb/tarow.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 当前结构的属性 为， `true` 并且 `other` 参数不为，则 `null` 通过将 `other` 参数传递给 `Equals` 当前结构的基础值的方法来确定相等性 。If the property of the current structure is `true` and the `other` argument is not `null`, equality is determined by passing the `other` parameter to the `Equals` method of the underlying value of the current structure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定对象和对象是否与 当前 对象相等。The following code example determines whether an object and a object are equal to the current object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性为 `true` ，则 可以通过属性访问当前对象的值 。If the property is `true`, the value of the current object can be accessed with the property. 否则，尝试访问其值会引发 异常。Otherwise, attempting to access its value throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Nullable` `Nullable(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 对象中 (的属性来确定它是否应显示对象的 属性或其 属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.hasvalue/cs/hasvalue2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.hasvalue/vb/hasvalue2.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此运算符支持从当前 实例到类型（的类型）的显式转换 `T` 。This operator supports the explicit conversion of the current instance to type `T`, the type of . 此类显式转换的语法依赖于语言。The syntax for such explicit conversions is language-dependent. 您还可以通过调用方法来执行转换 。You may also be able to perform the conversion by calling the method. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is ## Examples 运算符可实现如下所示的代码，将值转换 `Nullable(Of Int32)` 为 值。The operator enables code such as the following, which converts a `Nullable(Of Int32)` value to an value. [!code-csharp[System.Nullable~1.Conversion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.conversion/cs/explicit1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Nullable~1.Conversion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.conversion/vb/explicit1.vb#1)]

span.span: A value type.

summary.span: 创建一个新的 对象，并将其初始化为指定的值。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized to a specified value.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其 属性使用 参数进行初始化。

span.span: A object whose property is initialized with the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新值的属性 初始化为 `value` 参数，并将 属性初始化为 `true` 。The property of the new value is initialized to the `value` parameter and the property is initialized to `true`. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is > [!NOTE] > 在 c # 和 Visual Basic 中，从到的隐式转换不 `T` 会调用此运算符，因为这些语言具有用于转换的特殊规则。In C# and Visual Basic, an implicit conversion from `T` to does not invoke this operator because these languages have special rules for the conversion. 提供此运算符是为了使没有此类特殊规则的语言受益。This operator is provided for the benefit of languages that do not have such special rules. > [!NOTE] > 在 c # 和 Visual Basic 中，从或文本进行的隐式转换 `null` `Nothing` 将 生成 其 属性初始化为的值 `false` 。In C# and Visual Basic, an implicit conversion from a `null` or `Nothing` literal to produces a value whose property is initialized to `false`. 转换在编译时以这些语言进行，并且不调用任何运算符。The conversion occurs at compile time in these languages and does not invoke any operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未将类型的值 `T` 分配给 对象，则可以将其与属性进行比较， `null` 并检索其 属性，但不能访问其 属性或调用其其他成员。If a value of type `T` has not been assigned to the object, you can compare it to `null` and retrieve its property, but you cannot access its property or call its other members. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Nullable` `Nullable(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 对象中 (的属性来确定它是否应显示对象的 属性或其 属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property.
